org.springframework.data.redis.connection

接口 RedisScriptingCommands

  • 所有已知子接口:
    DefaultedRedisClusterConnection, DefaultedRedisConnection, RedisClusterConnection, RedisCommands, RedisConnection, StringRedisConnection
    所有已知实现类:
    org.springframework.data.redis.connection.AbstractRedisConnection, DefaultStringRedisConnection, JedisClusterConnection, JedisConnection, LettuceClusterConnection, LettuceConnection

    public interface RedisScriptingCommands
    Scripting commands.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <T> T eval(byte[] script, ReturnType returnType, int numKeys, byte[]... keysAndArgs)
      Evaluate given script.
      <T> T evalSha(byte[] scriptSha, ReturnType returnType, int numKeys, byte[]... keysAndArgs)
      Evaluate given scriptSha.
      <T> T evalSha(String scriptSha, ReturnType returnType, int numKeys, byte[]... keysAndArgs)
      Evaluate given scriptSha.
      List<Boolean> scriptExists(String... scriptShas)
      Check if given scriptShas exist in script cache.
      void scriptFlush()
      Flush lua script cache.
      void scriptKill()
      Kill current lua script execution.
      String scriptLoad(byte[] script)
      Load lua script into scripts cache, without executing it.

    • 方法详细资料

      • scriptFlush

        void scriptFlush()
        Flush lua script cache.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: SCRIPT FLUSH

      • scriptKill

        void scriptKill()
        Kill current lua script execution.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: SCRIPT KILL

      • scriptLoad

        @Nullable
String scriptLoad(byte[] script)
        Load lua script into scripts cache, without executing it.
        Execute the script by calling #evalSha(byte[], ReturnType, int, byte[]...).
        参数:
        script - must not be null.
        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: SCRIPT LOAD

      • scriptExists

        @Nullable
List<Boolean> scriptExists(String... scriptShas)
        Check if given scriptShas exist in script cache.
        参数:
        scriptShas -
        返回:
        one entry per given scriptSha in returned List or null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: SCRIPT EXISTS

      • eval

        @Nullable
<T> T eval(byte[] script,
                     ReturnType returnType,
                     int numKeys,
                     byte[]... keysAndArgs)
        Evaluate given script.
        参数:
        script - must not be null.
        returnType - must not be null.
        numKeys -
        keysAndArgs - must not be null.
        返回:
        script result. null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: EVAL

        @Nullable
<T> T evalSha(String scriptSha,
                        ReturnType returnType,
                        int numKeys,
                        byte[]... keysAndArgs)
        Evaluate given scriptSha.
        参数:
        scriptSha - must not be null.
        returnType - must not be null.
        numKeys -
        keysAndArgs - must not be null.
        返回:
        script result. null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: EVALSHA

      • evalSha

        @Nullable
<T> T evalSha(byte[] scriptSha,
                        ReturnType returnType,
                        int numKeys,
                        byte[]... keysAndArgs)
        Evaluate given scriptSha.
        参数:
        scriptSha - must not be null.
        returnType - must not be null.
        numKeys -
        keysAndArgs - must not be null.
        返回:
        script result. null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.5
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: EVALSHA
